# Vendor: CRS USA

## Product: SAM4s ER-915E Electronic Cash Register

**Item #:** 950092
**Category:** Commercial Grade ECR / POS Hardware
**Vendor:** CRS USA
**URL:** https://www.crs-usa.com/products/sam4s-ecr-er-915e

---

## Product Details

**Type:** Traditional format, commercial grade electronic cash register with receipt and journal printers

### Key Features
- ✅ **Ethernet Port** for DC Direct Payment Integration
- ✅ **Fast 22 Lines per Second Thermal Printing** with Drop and Print Paper Loading
- ✅ **Adjustable Two-Line Alpha-Numeric Backlit Liquid Crystal Operator Display**
- ✅ **Nine Digit LED Pop-Up Customer Display**
- ✅ **Two Standard RS-232C Ports** (Expandable to Four)
- ✅ **Semi-Integrated Electronic Payment** for Credit, Debit, and Gift Card Transactions
- ✅ **SD Port** for data storage
- ✅ **Optional Integrated Dual Track MCR** (Card Reader)
- ✅ **5 Bill, 5 Coin Cash Drawer** with Drawer Lock and Two Media Slots

---

## Specifications

| Spec | Value |
|------|-------|
| Printer Type | Direct Thermal, Drop-and-Print |
| Printer Speed | 22 Lines per Second |
| Paper Roll | 2-1/4" (58mm) |
| Operator Display | 2-Line x 16 Character Alpha-Numeric Backlit LCD |
| Customer Display | 9-Digit LED |
| Keyboard Capacity | Up to 41 Keys / 7-14 Department Keys |
| Serial Ports | COM1 & COM2 (Standard), COM3 & COM4 (Optional) |
| Ethernet Port | One for DC Direct Integration |
| Cash Drawer Port | RJ11 (24V) |
| Dimensions | 16-1/2"W x 15-3/4"D x 11-13/16"H |
| Weight | 25.10 lbs |
| Power | 120 AC ± 10%, 50/60 Hz |
| Power Consumption | Approx. 25 Watts |
| Operating Temp | 32° ~ 104°F (0° ~ 40°C) |
| Humidity | 30% to 80% RH (Non-Condensing) |
| Memory Protection | Full Charge for 24 Hours protects Memory for 90 Days |

---

## Use Cases

- Retail point of sale
- Restaurant management
- Small to medium business transactions
- Payment integration ready (credit/debit/gift cards)
